title: `rclone size` broken on onedrive with v1.65.0-beta
body:
Tests below with sample folder containing only 1 file. But the same with any other folder content.

Remote:
```
[onedrive]
type = onedrive
client_id = XXX
client_secret = XXX
drive_id = XXX
drive_type = personal
token = XXX
```

Works as expected with `rclone v1.64.0`

```
$ rclone version
rclone v1.64.0
- os/version: darwin 14.0 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 23.0.0 (x86_64)
- os/type: darwin
- os/arch: amd64
- go/version: go1.21.1
- go/linking: dynamic
- go/tags: cmount

$ time rclone size onedrive:Test -vv
2023/10/12 09:30:44 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.64.0" starting with parameters ["rclone" "size" "onedrive:Test" "-vv"]
2023/10/12 09:30:44 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "onedrive:Test"
2023/10/12 09:30:44 DEBUG : Using config file from "/Users/kptsky/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
Total objects: 1 (1)
Total size: 228 B (228 Byte)
2023/10/12 09:30:46 DEBUG : 8 go routines active

real	0m1.514s
user	0m0.120s
sys	0m0.103s
```

does not produce any results with latest beta - simply hangs forever without any error in debug log

```
$ ~/Temp/rclone-beta/rclone version
rclone v1.65.0-beta.7427.2de084944
- os/version: darwin 14.0 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 23.0.0 (x86_64)
- os/type: darwin
- os/arch: amd64
- go/version: go1.21.2
- go/linking: dynamic
- go/tags: cmount

$ time ~/Temp/rclone-beta/rclone size onedrive:Test -vv
2023/10/12 09:28:58 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.65.0-beta.7427.2de084944" starting with parameters ["/Users/kptsky/Temp/rclone-beta/rclone" "size" "onedrive:Test" "-vv"]
2023/10/12 09:28:58 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "onedrive:Test"
2023/10/12 09:28:58 DEBUG : Using config file from "/Users/kptsky/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
```
